$!Advice and support for carers and the people they care for.$!

$C
**Carers UK**  
[www.carersuk.org](http://www.carersuk.org "Carers UK"){:rel="external"}  
<info@carersuk.org>  
  
**In England, Scotland and Wales**  
**Telephone:** 0808 808 7777  
**Fax:** 020 7378 9781  
Wednesday and Thursday, 10am to 12pm and 2pm to 4pm  

**In Northern Ireland**  
**Telephone:** 028 9043 9843  
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5:30pm
$C

You can get advice on issues including: 

- [Carer's Allowance](/carers-allowance "Carer's Allowance")
- [Carer's Credit](/carers-credit "Carer's Credit")
- carers' employment rights
- [tax credits](/qualify-tax-credits-quick-questionnaire "Tax credits")
- [benefits](/benefits-adviser "Benefits") 

^Carers UK runs a network of local branches and contacts to support carers and put them in touch with others in their community.^
overview: Get advice and support for carers and the people they care for - telephone, email, opening hours, website
title: Carers UK
